title: Searching for the lost dogs of the Beirut blast
description: Many pets ran away after a massive explosion in Beirut, leaving Leila Molana-Allen pining for a missing puppy.

title: Algeria's lessons from The Plague in the age of coronavirus
description: Finding parallels between the famous novel and how Algeria is coping with coronavirus amid political upheaval.

title: Flooding in Hereford: Residents still in temporary homes
description: People whose houses flooded twice in four months are still in temporary homes.

title: 'They wanted to drown me at birth - now I'm a poet'
description: Kuli Kohli has always used writing as a means of escape from the prejudice she has experienced as an Asian woman with cerebral palsy.

title: Coronavirus doctor's diary: The fake news about schools that's misleading parents
description: A video claiming that children could be placed in quarantine at school could disrupt the start of term.

title: ICYMI: Aquarium art and crop portraits
description: Plus a newborn puma and pioneering women statues in our round-up of stories you may have missed this week.

title: The diary of my daughter's murder: 'We were in hell on earth'
description: Bea Jones started writing a diary as she tried to come to terms with the brutal murder of her daughter Moira.

title: Begum Rokeya: The forgotten 19th Century feminist
description: Begum Rokeya was a writer, educationalist and reformer who tirelessly fought for women's rights.

title: Coronavirus: Schools could go part-time and year-group bubbles be sent home
description: Contingency plans include part-time secondaries and whole year-groups sent home where cases confirmed.

title: Protest against Koran-burning turns violent in Sweden
description: Some 300 people clashed with police in Malmo, after far-right extremists burned a Koran.

title: Germany coronavirus: 'Anti-corona' protest in Berlin draws thousands
description: Thousands march against coronavirus restrictions in Germany's capital before being ordered to disperse.

title: Britain's Deignan wins La Course with dramatic finish
description: Britain's Lizzie Deignan wins La Course with a stunning sprint to the line in Nice ahead of 2019 champion Marianne Vos.

title: Jurassic Coast cliff fall: Warnings after cliff collapse at Hive Beach
description: The cliff at Hive Beach is one of the Dorset coastline's best known landmarks.

title: Rodrigo: Leeds United sign Valencia forward for club record fee
description: Leeds United sign Spain forward Rodrigo from Valencia for a club record fee of £26m on a four-year contract.

title: Chadwick Boseman: How Black Panther inspired children and adults
description: Chadwick Boseman and the Black Panther film helped many find their inner superhero.

title: Neuralink: Elon Musk unveils pig with chip in its brain
description: Gertrude the pig is a prototype of a brain-to-machine interface.

title: March on Washington 2020: 'Change is slow in America'
description: The BBC spoke to attendees at the March on Washington 2020 to see how far the country has come.

title: Jacob Blake reportedly released from handcuffs in hospital bed
description: Mr Blake, a black man, was shot in the back by police in Wisconsin, sparking protests.

title: Mohamed Salah & Jordan Henderson recall Liverpool's agonising wait for title
description: Liverpool's Mohamed Salah and Jordan Henderson recall how the club's agonising 30-year wait for a Premier League title continued during the uncertainty of the Covid-19 crisis.

title: Mr Gay England: The trans man competing 'against an idea of male beauty'
description: Chiyo feels his masculinity is judged every time he steps outside. Next year it will be judged on stage.

title: Chadwick Boseman: Black Panther star dies of cancer aged 43
description: The US actor, 43, was diagnosed with colon cancer four years ago but never made the news public.

title: Coronavirus: Winter plans revealed in leaked Sage report
description: A leaked government report suggests a “reasonable worst case scenario” of 85,000 Covid deaths this winter.
